svg.text: • tsconfig.json - Compiler options and project settings
• No type checking at runtime (types erased)
TypeScript Code → Type Checking → Compilation → JavaScript → Runtime Execution
• Static type checking catches errors at compile time
• Enhanced developer experience with IntelliSense and refactoring
• Seamless JavaScript interoperability and ecosystem compatibility
2. Type System (Static Analysis, Type Checking, Inference)
